edu.utexas.cs.tamerProject.modeling.templates
Interface ObsActModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
CombinationModel, DPAgent.HashModel, IncGDLinearModel, IncModel, LoopMazeRewModel, MountainCarRewModel, RegressionModel, TabularModel, WekaModelPerActionModel, WekaModelWrap
public interface ObsActModel

The class Model is a very generic model that only does predictions from observations and actions. Hand-coded reward models should implement this class directly.

bradknox
